info.comment:
-=iSyn v2.6=-
-Help app updated with new graphics
-Top Bar changed to "Home Bar"
-Intro updated slightly
-Timing Improvements
-Widgets removed
-New Wallpaper Replacing the blurry 3rd

-=ABOUT=-
The iSyn ((2)) is an OS, though it should not be treated as a computer simulation. 

-=SYNWARE=-
You can download all sorts of iSyn apps from the SynWare gallery. (Here:  http://scratch.mit.edu/galleries/view/88492

Now to install the SynWare. Just open up your copy of the iSyn ((2)) Now click "file, import project" and select the SynWare you want to install. That's it. It will automatically set it self up next time you hit the green flag!

-=ADDING WALLPAPERS=-
This is a really great, easy mod that requires one step. Import ANY picture you want, onto the Stage's Background. Done. You can now set it as your defualt from the settings app.

-=ADDING IMAGES=-
Using the iSyn Gallery, you can view your own image files! Just go to the "image" sprite, and click on his costume tab. Here, click "import costumes" and select any image file you wish to import. Done.

-=ADDING MUSIC=-
Using the all new iSynTunes, you can listen to your own music. Just locate to the "muci" sprite, and import any music files you want into the "Sounds" tab.

-=Top Viewed=-
-15/7/2010
-16/7/2010
-17/7/2010

-=Top Loved=-
-17/7/2010
-18/7/2010
info.author: 08jackt

scriptComments:
IMPORTING SYNWARE?

Go "File" and then "Import Project" and select the SynWare you wish to install. Hit the greent flag to insall.

DON'T HAVE ANY SYNWARE TO INSTALL?

Go to this link: http://scratch.mit.edu/galleries/view/88492

And download ANY SynWare title you want! :D

IMPORTING WALLPAPERS?

Go to the "backgrounds top just above this note. Then click "import" and choose your wallpaper. 

NOW IT'S READY! :D

IMPORTING MUSIC FILES?
Go the sprite "music" and import any music files you want into the sprites "sound" tab. 

DONE. :D

Remember, adding to much music can slow down the iSyn dramatically.

**NOTE**
TRY TO USE AS LESS SCRIPTS AS POSSIBLE, AND AS LESS SPRITES AS POSSIBLE!!!

THANK YOU!

**HOW TO ADD YOUR APP TO THE SynWare Store!!!**

SIMPLY UPLOAD THE PROJECT, AND GIVE ME TH LINK TO IT IN THE SYNWARE GALLERY. I WILL THEN DOWNLOAD, AND UPLOAD IT TO A SEPERATE ACCOUNT CALLED "SynWare." 

YOUR CREATION WILL THEN BE ADDED TO THE SYNWARE SHOP.

**IMPORTANT!!!**

WHEN TESTING YOUR SCRIPT, DO NOT PRESS THE GREEN FLAG!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

INSTEAD, MAKE 2 COPIES OF THE iSYN. CALL THE 2ND COPY "iSYN APP TESTING"

TO TEST YOUR APP, SIMPLY SAVE YOUR APP FIRST.

NEXT IMPORT THE SAVED APP INTO THE "iSYN APP TESTING" FILE.

NOW START THE iSYN, AND TEST IT THERE.

AFTER YOU HAVE TESTED IT, CLOSE THE "iSYN APP TESTING" FILE, AND DO *NOT* SAVE IT.

CONTINUE EDITING YOU SCRIPTS AND APP AFTERWARDS. 

AND REPEAT. UNTIL YOUR APP IS 100% WORKING AND FINISHED!

**NOTE**
TRY TO USE AS LESS SCRIPTS AS POSSIBLE, AND AS LESS SPRITES AS POSSIBLE!!!

THANK YOU!

**HOW TO ADD YOUR APP TO THE SynWare Store!!!**

SIMPLY UPLOAD THE PROJECT, AND GIVE ME TH LINK TO IT IN THE SYNWARE GALLERY. I WILL THEN DOWNLOAD, AND UPLOAD IT TO A SEPERATE ACCOUNT CALLED "SynWare." 

YOUR CREATION WILL THEN BE ADDED TO THE SYNWARE SHOP.

**IMPORTANT!!!**

WHEN TESTING YOUR SCRIPT, DO NOT PRESS THE GREEN FLAG!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

INSTEAD, MAKE 2 COPIES OF THE iSYN. CALL THE 2ND COPY "iSYN APP TESTING"

TO TEST YOUR APP, SIMPLY SAVE YOUR APP FIRST.

NEXT IMPORT THE SAVED APP INTO THE "iSYN APP TESTING" FILE.

NOW START THE iSYN, AND TEST IT THERE.

AFTER YOU HAVE TESTED IT, CLOSE THE "iSYN APP TESTING" FILE, AND DO *NOT* SAVE IT.

CONTINUE EDITING YOU SCRIPTS AND APP AFTERWARDS. 

AND REPEAT. UNTIL YOUR APP IS 100% WORKING AND FINISHED!

scripts: If Bug Fixer Failed, Please Restart The System!

scriptComments:
INSERT IMAGES INTO THE COSTUMES TAB!!!

ANY SIZES ALLOWED! THOUGH IT IS RECKONMENDED NOT TO ADD MORE THAN 5, AS THE iSYN MAY BEGIN TO LAG!
